tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Ankur is amazing! I was suffering from cervical spondylosis and had been in pain for weeks, with the pain becoming unbearable. When I visited Dr. Ankur, he attentively listened to my symptoms and the problems I was facing. The medication he prescribed was spot on! I had been taking other painkillers before, but they weren't giving me any relief. However, the ones he prescribed worked perfectly!
He explained everything in detail, which gave me great satisfaction. I would rate the whole treatment 10 out of 10. He is definitely one of the best orthopedic surgeons around. Thanks so much for the amazing treatment. I am really thankful and glad that I came across such an amazing doctor. Thank you for the work you do!

tags: None
review: I(Ritwik kr pandey) was suffering from lower back pain from last 3 months.i was very concerned about my lower back.I search many doctor online then I found Dr Ankur Goyal sir.and this was my best decision to visit him.he explained my problem so well and most important motivated me to focus on my UPSC preparation not my problem.just few medicines and now my back pain is gone.i saw a quote in his clinic 'Dont judge my degree with your Google search'.this quote best suite on him really! I'll highly recommend Dr Ankur Goyal sir to all of you.thank you so much Dr for your motivation to heal me quickly.
reply_text: Thanku for such encouraging words ...hope ur doing well

review: My mother was experiencing pain in the joints which is area around the knee and arms .. Previous orthopedic diagnosed arthritis to my mother and suggested physiotherapy which elevated the pain even more... But then I visited Dr.Ankur Goyal..He listened to my mother's side of story.. And suggestted some investigations..prescribed minimal medications..Now my mother is feeling much better..She's able to sleep at nigh now..Thanks Doctor..

review: Doctor is very nice. He listens to the problem with patience and suggests limited medicines. He also follows up himself by calling or messaging. Doctor is quite balanced and nice and treats his patients with friendliness and in a very reassuring manner.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Was immediately relieved of my pain and discomfort in the first visit itself. He was very thorough with the explanations and treatment. He kept tab on my progress and it was very easy and comfortable to communicate with him. Took me less than the speculated time to heal and get back to normal. Overall a very good experience.

tags: None
review:
He is a good listener and a great doctor. I went to him after I experienced spasm in my lower back. Heard my medical history and prescribed medicine and exercises only after that (which is rare it itself). 
Follow through visit was also productive. He has kept in touch even after two months. I would highly recommend him.
